snippet.title: Backpack Twins Switch version Trailer
snippet.description:
Swap. Solve. Survive.
Backpack Twins is a hard but fair single-player puzzle platformer. 
Swap between the twins as you control them to make the two work together to solve puzzles. 

Released on Steam by indie game creator Ima Bryn in August 2019, this game is tough but fair, and generated buzz for its excellent controls, retro vibes, and humorous gameplay. 
To enable a wider audience to play Backpack Twins, Amata has been ported to Xbox One, PlayStation®4, and Nintendo Switch™ and released worldwide with support for multiple languages.

■About Backpack Twins
- A carefully crafted blend of platforming and puzzle-solving.
- Old-school platforming that will test your skills!
- Collectibles that are easy to find but hard to get! Get them all to unlock additional awesomeness!
- Responsive and precise controls.
- Speedrun friendly. The last and best times are saved for each level.
- Achievements!　*Excluding the Switch version
- Includes left and right-handed gamepad layouts for accessibility.
- Made with love, just for you.
- Backpacks! (x2)
- Twins! (x2)
- Humor! (Not guaranteed)

■Factsheet 
Title: Backpack Twins
Genre: Hard but fair single-player puzzle platformer
Supported Hardware: Xbox One, PlayStation®4
Distributing Stores (Download only): 
・Microsoft Store 
　・US Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/backpack-twins/9p39s1m4854n
　・UK Store: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/backpack-twins/9p39s1m4854n
　・HK Store: https://www.xbox.com/zh-HK/games/store/backpack-twins/9p39s1m4854n
　・JP Store: https://www.xbox.com/ja-jp/games/store/backpack-twins/9p39s1m4854n
・PlayStation™Store
　・US Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1181-CUSA26185_00-2240043536322697
　・UK Store: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP1177-CUSA26184_00-5993546653646817
　・HK Store: https://store.playstation.com/zh-hant-hk/product/UP1181-CUSA26185_00-2240043536322697
　・JP Store: https://store.playstation.com/ja-jp/product/UP1181-CUSA26185_00-2240043536322697
・Nintendo eShop
　・Americas: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/backpack-twins-switch/
　・Europe (UK):  https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Backpack-Twins-2323638.html
　・Hong Kong: https://ec.nintendo.com/HK/zh/titles/70010000047198
　・Korea: https://store.nintendo.co.kr/70010000047197
　・Japan: https://store-jp.nintendo.com/list/software/70010000047199.html
Number of Players: 1 
Online Play: No online play is available
Languages: Japanese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish
Price: 11.99USD (Prices may differ across regions) 
Release Date: November 17, 2022, *Switch version is January 5, 2023
Ratings: IARC 16+
Developer: Ima Bryn
Publisher: AMATA K.K.
Official Website (Amata Games): https://amata.games/en/game/backpack-twins/
Copyright: ©2019 Ima Bryn All rights reserved.


“PlayStation Family Mark", “PlayStation”, “PS4 logo”, and “PS4” are registered trademarks or trademarks of Sony Interactive Entertainment Inc.
©Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
Nintendo Switch is a trademark of Nintendo.
Other company names, hardware names, service names, etc… are their respective owners' trademarks and/or registered trademarks.
